backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining types and state for retailers, products, listings, users, and permissions with migration, authorization, and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new formats, mainly adding createdAt to listings while preserving other stored data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence associations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, their themes, behaviors, and structural roles across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and shared UI tokens for the frontend theme.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and app bootstrap configuring pages, routes, layout, admin protection, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/DangerZone: UI card for confirming and executing a full system wipe, handling confirmation input, mutation state, and post-wipe recovery actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for editing a product’s name, category, and description with validation and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerEd: Dialog for editing retailer details and operating hours, converting backend schedule formats and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerHo: Editor component for managing weekly operating hours and holiday overrides for retailers.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Searchable dropdown select using a popover and command menu to filter and choose options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Non-visual component that triggers admin bootstrap logic when identity changes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Wrapper that restricts content to authenticated admin users and shows appropriate access alerts.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Fullscreen overlay shown during login or actor initialization with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Image component with fallback rendering for failed loads, supporting logo and hero styles.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that captures runtime and unhandled promise errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: UI screen showing details of a runtime error with actions to reload or go home.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Hook providing search, category filtering, and price sorting for catalog items.
frontend/src/components/shop/CataloguePr: Fetches and displays featured product listings with images and links to product pages.
Footer showing credits, branding, and community message.
Header with branding, auth controls, and navigation for admin, shopper, and driver roles.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopLanding: Hero section with branding, tagline, and hero image for the shop landing page.
Page layout wrapping content with header, footer, and auth initialization overlay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Attempts one-time admin bootstrap on first load and updates related admin queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient and exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as provinces, retailers, listings, products, and role applications.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including color tokens and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageList: Admin interface for viewing, grouping, creating, editing, and deleting product listings using various mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: Admin page for creating, editing, and deleting retailers, including schedule management and holiday overrides.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Dashboard for admins to manage products and listings, including creation forms, edits, deletions, and system maintenance actions.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverDashboardP: Displays delivery-ready orders for drivers, allowing them to accept and mark deliveries as completed.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: Shows available roles and handles user applications, including authentication and submission dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MasterAdminRoleA: Allows master admins to review, approve, or reject pending role applications with approval and rejection dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Shows detailed product information with images and retailer listings, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Lists provinces for shoppers to browse local retailers and includes a call‑to‑action to join the platform.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RequestNewProduc: Page with a form to submit new product or retailer requests, including validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerCatalogP: Displays a retailer’s product catalog with search, sorting, product navigation, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerListPage: Lists retailers for a given town or suburb, handling loading, empty, and error cases.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: Shows the user's role applications with status badges, dates, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperDashboard: Dashboard for shoppers to view placed orders and perform accept or mark-done actions.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Lists towns within a province and lets users navigate to retailers in each town with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides helpers to format, parse, and validate ZAR amounts stored as bigint rands.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Utility functions to select primary product images, list up to three images, generate blob URLs, and check remaining image slots.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds BASE_URL-safe paths to public assets for dev and production environments.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: Exports a constant list of South African provinces and its corresponding type.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts IC bigint nanosecond timestamps into human‑readable date or date‑time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and removing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, new requests, and architectural notes for the admin listings dashboard.
